feed.title: BookLore Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.43
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fix white-on-white text issue by setting darkModeSelector for PrimeNG (#101) by @oliveruh
  • Include author name in the goodreads search term (#100) by @adityachandelgit

⚙️ CI/CD

  • Build image for all branches (#96) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.44
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

  • Update Angular and Spring Boot dependencies (April 2025) (#105) by @adityachandelgit

🚀 Features

  • Display Git Version in Angular UI via Build-Time Injection (#113) by @adityachandelgit
  • Tweak layout and spacing on metadata details page (#112) by @adityachandelgit
  • Hide progress-bar for the uploader & Make "uploading" icon spin (#107) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Resolve issue with email being sent to wrong recipient (#110) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.45
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Implement version info endpoint and update version display in UI (#117) by @adityachandelgit
  • Make genre tags horizontally scrollable (#115) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.46
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Add bulk lock/unlock metadata functionality for books (#123) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add an “Overwrite All Metadata” button to the book metadata picker (#121) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add Reset Button for Metadata Fields in Metadata Picker Tab (#120) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Add GNU General Public License v3.0 (#126) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.1.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

  • Merge Develop into Master – Stable Release Update (#142) by @adityachandelgit

🚀 Features

  • feat: allow modifying mariadb connection (#135) by @astappiev
  • fix: use correct server port for dev server (#136) by @astappiev
  • fix: submit login and password change forms by pressing enter (#137) by @astappiev
  • Display changelog from current version to latest upon clicking the update link (#134) by @adityachandelgit
  • Separate ratings for Amazon and Goodreads (#128) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • fix: uploading books on Windows (dev env) doesn't work (#138) by @astappiev

📖 Documentation

  • Enhance README with Better Visual Appeal and Engagement (#141) by @adityachandelgit

⚙️ CI/CD

  • Support automatic version bump using PR labels or commit messages (#130) by @adityachandelgit
